n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>ORAMON_STATS</SCHEMA> <NAME>ORAMON_TOP_SQLS_MAX_VERSION_COUNT</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INSTANCE_NUMBER</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DBID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>B_SNAP_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>E_SNAP_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>B_SNAP_TIME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>E_SNAP_TIME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INTERVAL_MIN</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DBTIMEMIN</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>AAS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>HV</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ELAPSED_TIME_SEC</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>EXECUTIONS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ELAPSED_PER_EXEC_SEC</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PERCENT_OF_DBTIME_USED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CPU_TIME_SEC</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CPU_TIME_MS_PER_EXEC</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHYSICAL_READS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHYSICAL_READS_PER_EXECUTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>BUFFER_GETS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>GETS_PER_EXECUTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ROWS_PROCESSED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ROWS_PROCESSED_PER_EXECUTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PARSE_CALLS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>MAX_SHARABLE_MEM_KB</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LAST_SHARABLE_MEM_KB</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>MAX_VERSION_COUNT</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LAST_VERSION_COUNT</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DELTA_VERSION_COUNT</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME_SEC</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CWT_PERCENT_OF_ELAPSED_TIME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>AVG_HARD_PARSE_TIME_MS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>MODULE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SQL_TEXT</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>EVENT_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INSTANCE_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>HOST_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select tops."INSTANCE_NUMBER",tops."DBID",tops."B_SNAP_ID",tops."E_SNAP_ID",tops."B_SNAP_TIME",tops."E_SNAP_TIME",tops."INTERVAL_MIN",tops."DBTIMEMIN",tops."AAS",tops."HV",tops."ELAPSED_TIME_SEC",tops."EXECUTIONS",tops."ELAPSED_PER_EXEC_SEC",tops."PERCENT_OF_DBTIME_USED",tops."CPU_TIME_SEC",tops."CPU_TIME_MS_PER_EXEC",tops."PHYSICAL_READS",tops."PHYSICAL_READS_PER_EXECUTION",tops."BUFFER_GETS",tops."GETS_PER_EXECUTION",tops."ROWS_PROCESSED",tops."ROWS_PROCESSED_PER_EXECUTION",tops."PARSE_CALLS",tops."MAX_SHARABLE_MEM_KB",tops."LAST_SHARABLE_MEM_KB",tops."MAX_VERSION_COUNT",tops."LAST_VERSION_COUNT",tops."DELTA_VERSION_COUNT",tops."CLUSTER_WAIT_TIME_SEC",tops."CWT_PERCENT_OF_ELAPSED_TIME",tops."AVG_HARD_PARSE_TIME_MS",tops."MODULE",tops."SQL_TEXT" ,'max_version_count' as event_name ,(select get_instance_name from dual) instance_name ,di.host_name from table(get_top_sqls(p_start_time => to_char(trunc(sysdate),'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI'), p_end_time => to_char(sysdate,'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI'),p_top_n_by_attribute => 'max_version_count')) tops inner join perfstat.stats$database_instance di on tops.dbid = di.dbid</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
